abstract.value: This dataset provides access to climate indicator ensemble statisics data that drives mapping and time-series visualizations on ClimateData.ca. title.value: Climatedata.ca : CMIP5 : Climatic normal (30 year average) ensemble percentiles for CanDCS-U5 (BCCAQv2) derived climate indicators
